doc.long_description:
Worst-case performance: O(N^2)

If you call bubble_sort(arr,True), you can see the process of the sort
Default is simulation = False
doc.full:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bubble_sort

Worst-case performance: O(N^2)

If you call bubble_sort(arr,True), you can see the process of the sort
Default is simulation = False
